name: Corrupt Worlds
description:
This is my submission to the Unexpected Game Jam 2020 this game is about you playing as a hero and the vilian The Corrupter corrupts your save file the key to your most powerful ability the ability to save and load the universe how will you uncorrupt your save file?

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look Around

E - Interact

Esc (or P for browser version) - Pause Menu

Oh yeah! you might need this to translate you will know what i mean when you get into the game
